title: Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left (partial view, page torn): DONA......
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right in graphite: SCALE: 1"=1'0"/7796 [circled]; dimensions in graphite; inscribed on verso in graphite, lower right: Stow-Davies
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for small end table. Low, rectangular table with rounded corners on left side, squared corners on right. Cabinet on left with vertical pull on door at right; two shelves on the right side of table, open on two sides. Surface of table and outer sides in darker wood; cabinet door and shelves in lighter wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "End Table", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-878.
